ABOUT US

KARYA TUGAS
PARAMITRA
CARROSERIE

Karyatugas Paramitra Carroserie is an end to end madern
carroserie special vehicle / car build partners, that
leverage a unique service industry to serve their customer
at a very high level, combined with experienced founders
and professionals, to build Indonesia's next generation of
carroserie. The company is Indonesian owned and
operated with a demonstrated national capability.

For us, the creation of special vehicle starts with a deep
understanding of industry requirements. That means
listening in order to be a step ahead, ensuring service
maturity. With our technology and creativity, each vehicle
produced and deliver will be on the future-proofed
specification required in 10, 15 and even 20 years time
ahead.

OUR

APPROACH

Agility

Identify and act quickly to opportunities and challenges with a smart solution to simplifying complex processes and avoid service delays that could impact costs and delivery.

Productivity

Get more out of our resources by creating efficiencies and converting suppliers and consultants into a harmonious ecosystem to maximize profitability and loyalty.

Transparency

Get 360 degree command process visibility across all aspects of your vehicle creation to provide actionable insights about every facet of our operation.

Creativity & Intelligence

Simplified smart team that provides instantaneous insights into breakthrough solutions for an efficient and usefull fast practice of your business culture and needs.
